scripts.podman:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(echo $(build-env dmnDevSandboxDeploymentBaseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dmnDevSandboxDeploymentBaseImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env dmnDevSandboxDeploymentBaseImageEnv.account)/$(build-env dmnDevSandboxDeploymentBaseImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) --build-arg KOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
